delegation.translation[0].definitions[0]: a group of people who represent a company, organization etc
A trade delegation will visit Kuwait.
the head of the American delegation to the United Nations
delegation.translation[0].definitions[1]: the process of giving power or work to someone else so that they are responsible for part of what you normally do
delegation.translation[1].definitions[0]: a group of people who officially represent a company, organization, government etc
A delegation of British business executives has arrived in Cuba for trade talks.
The company’s chief executive led a powerful delegation to today’s meeting.
delegation.translation[1].definitions[1]: the process of giving part of your power or work to someone else, usually someone in a lower position than you
